reviews.text: So I received a gift card for this place and let‚Äôs just say look at the pictures. The pizza is good. The chicken wings is good. The bread is good. You know what I‚Äôm lying. This food is amazing thank you uncle Andy this was a fresh new discovery and I will definitely be back hey Berkeley, Michigan, Michigan. I hope you‚Äôre not sleeping on uncle Andy‚Äôs pizza if you are, you need to wake up and go down to uncle Andy‚Äôs and get you some pizza as you can see I got pizza I got chicken wings. I got bread. I got it all, truly tastes great!

one of my favorite places to get pizza for my family! I love how they do text coupon deals throughout the week. Never had issues with my orders & they always taste great!! Picking up is always a breeze. The stuffed cheese bread is probably my fav :))

It‚Äôs the only place I‚Äôll get take-out pizza from.  I always order online and take advantage of the coupons that I receive via text.

Always delicious and the staff is friendly. The order is always ready when promised.

The marinara sauce that the cheesy bread comes with is outstanding!

We‚Äôll done Uncle Andy and team.

I‚Äôm glad you can get a specialty pizza as eight corner Pizza. The chicken that you use on pizza is the best I‚Äôve had so far. I think if your name is Andy, you should get a five dollar discount. Thanks for making a great pizza.

Dude, for real! I haven't been here in about 20 years. Got two slices today, and it was hands down amazing. The dough is thick and crispy but not too filling, perfect amount of cheese and butter, the sauce and cheese have a perfect ratio, and the sauce has a nice bite, plenty of flavor! I forgot how much I Iike this place. DEFINITELY coming back!

editorial_summary.overview: Simple strip-mall shop specializing in Chicago-style pizzas, plus grinders, wings & more.

detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza, cheese bread and grinders. My go to spot.

detailedReviews.text: The best pizza! Andy is the nicest guy and runs the business perfectly. Berkley is lucky to have such a great place.

detailedReviews.text: Uncle Andy‚Äôs is a hidden gem! Never disappoints!! I‚Äôve told many friends about it and they all agree!

detailedReviews.author: Victor C
detailedReviews.text: Pepperoni is fine as wine, hard to beat the deep dish ! 20 years and going... another satisfying meal!

detailedReviews.author: Sharon Sorsby
detailedReviews.text: Great  food!! Exceptional Pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Thayer Asaff
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town

detailedReviews.author: Chrissy Janelle
detailedReviews.text: Amazing crust flavors , products taste fresh, fairly good customer service.

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Milligan
detailedReviews.text: Quickly moved Uncle Andy's into the regular rotation!

detailedReviews.author: Beth Wilson
detailedReviews.text: Food and staff are so awesome!! We had it delivered but so so nice‚ù§Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Dre Dec
detailedReviews.text: Best place ever. If you like jets deep dish. Once you eat uncle Andy‚Äôs deep dish you will never go back. A lot less greasy and so fresh. Fresh mushrooms not from a can like green lantern . Also their Chicago style. Is amazing for those who don‚Äôt want to travel all the way to downtown Detroit( and quick also) all the staff are super friendly and if something goes wrong they will take care of it. Can‚Äôt say enough of good things about this place.

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Sims-Carter
detailedReviews.text: Very good! Always consistent. Real toppings.

detailedReviews.author: Melonie Summers
detailedReviews.text: This is the best tasting pizza in the area. The Detroit style is fresh and hot! Thr thin crust is also delicious üòã üòç üëå

detailedReviews.author: james whitmyer
detailedReviews.text:
Love uncle Andy‚Äôs pizza
Great pizza pie and reliable ordering through the app or online.

detailedReviews.author: Butterfly Ice
detailedReviews.text: So I received a gift card for this place and let‚Äôs just say look at the pictures. The pizza is good. The chicken wings is good. The bread is good. You know what I‚Äôm lying. This food is amazing thank you uncle Andy this was a fresh new discovery and I will definitely be back hey Berkeley, Michigan, Michigan. I hope you‚Äôre not sleeping on uncle Andy‚Äôs pizza if you are, you need to wake up and go down to uncle Andy‚Äôs and get you some pizza as you can see I got pizza I got chicken wings. I got bread. I got it all, truly tastes great!

detailedReviews.author: Athina Ray
detailedReviews.text: My favorite pizza spot for a while now üòã

detailedReviews.author: Harry Rohr
detailedReviews.text: Dude, for real! I haven't been here in about 20 years. Got two slices today, and it was hands down amazing. The dough is thick and crispy but not too filling, perfect amount of cheese and butter, the sauce and cheese have a perfect ratio, and the sauce has a nice bite, plenty of flavor! I forgot how much I Iike this place. DEFINITELY coming back!

detailedReviews.author: Cathy Schassberger
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is always amazing, delivery is fast and drivers are friendly!

detailedReviews.author: Danielle Workman
detailedReviews.text: Uncle Andy‚Äôs has an amazing Brooklyn style gluten free thin crust pizza without the soggy or funny aftertaste. And they offer a LARGE doe just a few dollars more than most places charge for a small.  This means I can have dinner and leftovers for lunch together next day‚Ä¶ that is if I don‚Äôt eat it for breakfast cold right from the fridge!    All for about $20-25! The staff are nice and efficient.  And with 696 shut down, it‚Äôs on my way home at 12 Mile and Woodward.   I‚Äôll post a photo next time‚Ä¶ last night's pie, as Earnie Harwell would say, ‚Äúis looonng gooonne!‚Äù

detailedReviews.author: marc mcdaniels
detailedReviews.text: The spot was nice and the pizza was cooked perfectly. Unfortunately for me, I like pizza with flavor and this did not have any.

detailedReviews.author: Brandon
detailedReviews.text: I ordered the wrong pizza, but they went out of their way and asked if they could remake it for me the way I wanted and would rush it through. but honestly it was my fault, the pizza looked so good I felt like it would have been a waste. I took the pizza as it was and it was beyond amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Elliot Patti
detailedReviews.text: THE best pizza you can get in the area, hands down

detailedReviews.author: sexyjadared
detailedReviews.text: I just recently had Uncle Andy's pizza and was blown away. I am officially a fan and customer!

detailedReviews.author: Amy Valesano
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town. Hands down! Everything is tasty. Grinders are so good! Always great service‚Äîsuper friendly and professional.

detailedReviews.author: LJ
detailedReviews.text: Superb Pizza! Superb Service! Pizza is always fresh, fast, and delicious!üòã

detailedReviews.author: Adam Cole
detailedReviews.text: BLT grinder was perfectly prepared and delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Trissa Fisher
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and fast and friendly service

detailedReviews.author: Gary S
detailedReviews.text: Best gluten free pizza in town.

detailedReviews.author: pat maslowsky
detailedReviews.text: I'm a new customer & I said to myself "where have I been?" LOL! Your pizza is superb! We usually eat Jets but I like your pizza better & your online ordering is awesome! Your counter help is very friendly too! 5‚≠ês all around!!!

detailedReviews.author: James Bibart
detailedReviews.text: Great delivery guys, fast friendly. Even helped me get a loose dog back in the house.

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Cotant
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was decent but I was surprised to walk in and see they also sell donuts and build your own ramen haha. Pretty cool and unique. Also, I had simple ol round so maybe I'll try square and thin crust.

detailedReviews.author: Chuck Sizzle
detailedReviews.text: Pretty darn good, I consider myself a pizza critic and I don‚Äôt give praise easily. Not greasy, constructed with care.

detailedReviews.author: Julie Metz
detailedReviews.text: Great team members!

detailedReviews.author: Andy Wieczorkowski
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza. Great deals. Great service.

detailedReviews.author: Rachel Lasser
detailedReviews.text: Did not like this pizza unfortunately. Cheese was flavorless. Crust had that artificial butter flavor. Wouldn‚Äôt eat here again :/ Staff was nice tho.

detailedReviews.author: Tanisha Lewis
detailedReviews.text: The food is fresh and the staff is extremely nice

detailedReviews.author: Ray Coleman
detailedReviews.text: Uncle Andy‚Äôs pizza is the best hands down! For three years this pizza has been consistently great! The staff is excellent, the service is very professional and all around, again the pizza is soooo good!

detailedReviews.author: Kimberly McNeil
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza. My family enjoyed it!!!

detailedReviews.author: paula cudney
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza was delivered within 25 minutes!  Good deals via text alerts too!

detailedReviews.author: Dave Henry
detailedReviews.text: Order from here almost every week. Fast, friendly, nearby and great tasting pizza. What more do you want?

detailedReviews.author: Juliana Clark
detailedReviews.text: Got the chicken fajita deep dish pizza and spicy Asian wings. Delicious. First time and we will order again

detailedReviews.author: Jeremy Collins
detailedReviews.text: Uncle Andy‚Äôs is awesome best funcle pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Janice Thomas
detailedReviews.text: Food is delicious. We had salad, pizza, wings, and a sandwich. Also got 6 doughnuts!! Awesome!

detailedReviews.author: Shannon Tierney
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was excellent as usual! We used our coupon they text weekly. For $11 and some change our family of 3 had a quick dinner after a busy day and evening.

detailedReviews.author: John B
detailedReviews.text: Food was great, easy website to use and great rewards program. Employees are beyond friendly on the phone. I talked to some gentleman and he was absolutely kind and helpful. Great Delivery service. Lastly and most important, the food was excellent. Loved the pizza! Will definitely be ordering from you again, and will refer anyone to you looking for a great place to order a pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Pay Grundner
detailedReviews.text: Very friendly staff

detailedReviews.author: Ashley C
detailedReviews.text: Always so, so good! Great staff and food at this location. Keep up the good work!

detailedReviews.author: Justyn Selph
detailedReviews.text: Ordered delivery for me and my choosy vegetarian son.   Everything was great. Best breadsticks I can remember having. Thunder sticks are possibly the most perfect breadsticks.  My son said his pizza was the best he has had.  I ordered the Chicago style. Couldn‚Äôt have been better.

detailedReviews.author: Dr.Neisha Smith
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was very good but just a tad bit too much sauce

detailedReviews.author: Theresa V
detailedReviews.text: one of my favorite places to get pizza for my family! I love how they do text coupon deals throughout the week. Never had issues with my orders & they always taste great!! Picking up is always a breeze. The stuffed cheese bread is probably my fav :))

detailedReviews.author: jennifer heaton
detailedReviews.text: I might be old school, but I refuse to pay a third party for delivery, the first time I called Uncle Andy's and asked if I had to go through any 3rd party for delivery and they said no. Made me realize they have their own delivery people... They have real people answering the phones, Uncle Andy is real and not some corporate BS. Thank You Uncle Andy, by the way Your Pizza is now marked as my absolute favorite in all of Metro Detroit. I forgot to reveiw how incredible the pizza is. When you've been in the restaurant industry for most of your life, some times the service is all you focus on. Well let me tell you. Be very proud of your product and employees.

detailedReviews.author: kronos 1
detailedReviews.text: Great place to get pizza. There BBQ chicken pizza is üî•

detailedReviews.author: Ed Gohl
detailedReviews.text: Uncle Andy‚Äôs, always consistently great pizza, his team is the best, friendly, courteous. Andy is a real person, known him since he started  out.

detailedReviews.author: Norma Olson
detailedReviews.text: Good food and good deal came to my email.

detailedReviews.author: Lucille Evans
detailedReviews.text: We have been enjoying Uncle Andy‚Äôs pizza for years. The pizza is tasty and service is always great. You can‚Äôt go wrong with Uncle Andy‚Äôs.

detailedReviews.author: diane brus
detailedReviews.text: Always accurate hot and delicious. The most courteous employees ever !

detailedReviews.author: Rene' LeBlanc-Sharer
detailedReviews.text: Easy to order & pickup.  Love the thin crust.

detailedReviews.author: Blaine Tillander
detailedReviews.text: Consistently great food and service.

detailedReviews.author: Ernest Alexander
detailedReviews.text:
They did me right!!!!
I said cheese and well done
And that's just what Uncle Andy's  gave me !!!
LOVE THIS PIZZA!!

detailedReviews.author: Kris Hoemke
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was amazing just the right amount of cheese and sauce.  The pepperoni and Italian sausage was fresh with a generous amount put on top of the pizza.  I like how I was given a text message that my pizza had left the store and was on its way.  And from the time that I ordered my pizza to the time I received, my pizza was done in a timely fashion. Didn‚Äôt have to wait long at all..

detailedReviews.author: Patricia Ann Simmons
detailedReviews.text: Great customer service from delivery driver! Quick fast service and excellent BBQ chicken pizza. Thanks!!

detailedReviews.author: Myles Graybill
detailedReviews.text: They make an amazing Chicago style pizza. And I love the fact that they broke down the wall and joined up with some Mochinut

detailedReviews.author: Mike Eisenberg
detailedReviews.text: Uncle Andy‚Äôs has become a staple in our home, great pizza, good salads, fast delivery coupled with  polite kind service.

detailedReviews.author: Julie Gordon
detailedReviews.text: Best square pizza ever.  Best customer service

detailedReviews.author: Sam Dox
detailedReviews.text: Best cheese bread in all of Metro Detroit! they got some crazy donuts too!

detailedReviews.author: Sam Senawi
detailedReviews.text: The best of wings and stuffed cheesy bread you'll ever have in your life sorry no pictures couldn't wait to eat it

detailedReviews.author: Claire Mccaffrey
detailedReviews.text: My daughter has a gluten allergy and is SO picky about the gluten free pizza she eats. Uncle Andy‚Äôs is her absolute favorite and it never disappoints. We also love that there is a large gluten free size available. The service is always great and the food is ready quickly. Anyone gluten free and looking for a great option, we highly recommend Uncle Andy‚Äôs!

detailedReviews.author: Kris Dudzinski
detailedReviews.text: Always wonderful ‚ù§Ô∏è The new mochinut is a great addition üòÄ

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.9/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the convenience of ordering online and receiving coupons via text, which enhances their take-out experience. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The pizza is consistently praised for its great taste and fast service, making it a go-to spot for many. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The friendly and accommodating staff, especially noted for their exceptional service during events, is a standout feature. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Lack of flavor in pizza - review management can address this concern
Negative perception of cheese and crust flavor - social media marketing can improve this area
Variety and uniqueness not effectively communicated - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

neutral.author: marc mcdaniels
neutral.text: The spot was nice and the pizza was cooked perfectly. Unfortunately for me, I like pizza with flavor and this did not have any.

negative.author: Rachel Lasser
negative.text: Did not like this pizza unfortunately. Cheese was flavorless. Crust had that artificial butter flavor. Wouldn‚Äôt eat here again :/ Staff was nice tho.

recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
